Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.eikasus.objectsmyfriends.model.bo.Item
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    @Entity(name="Item")
public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class representing an item being sold.

      • Item

        public Item(java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String description,
            java.util.Date biddingStart,
            java.util.Date biddingEnd,
            int initialPrice,
            ItemState state,
            User seller,
            User buyer,
            Category category)
        Create a full qualified item.
        Parameters:
        name - Short name of the item (<= 32 cars).
        description - Description of the item (<= 512 cars).
        biddingStart - Start of the bidding.
        biddingEnd - End of the bidding.
        initialPrice - Initial price of the idem.
        state - Current state of the item.
        seller - Seller of the item.
        buyer - Buyer of the item.
        category - Category of the item.

      • addImage

        public Item addImage(Image image)
        Add an image to the item.

        An image is added to the item and his corresponding property in the image is updated to guaranty the bidirectional relation. Note that this is the only way to add an image. Trying to add an image in the list returned by getImages() is not possible as this list is read only.

        Parameters:
        image - Image to add.
        Returns:
        Instance of the item for setters chaining.

      • removeImage

        public Item removeImage(Image image)
        Remove an image from the item.

        An image is removed from the item and his corresponding property in the image is updated to guaranty the bidirectional relation. Note that this is the only way to remove an image. Trying to remove an image in the list returned by getImages() is not possible as this list is read only.

        Parameters:
        image - Image to remove.
        Returns:
        Instance of the item for setters chaining.

      • addBid

        public Item addBid(Bid bid)
        Add a bid to the item.

        A bid is added to the item and his corresponding property in the bid is updated to guaranty the bidirectional relation. Note that this is the only way to add a bid. Trying to add a bid in the list returned by getBids() is not possible as this list is read only.

        Parameters:
        bid - Bid to add.
        Returns:
        Instance of the item for setters chaining.

      • removeBid

        public Item removeBid(Bid bid)
        Remove a bid from the item.

        A bid is removed from the item and his corresponding property in the bid is updated to guaranty the bidirectional relation. Note that this is the only way to remove a bid. Trying to remove a bid in the list returned by getBids() is not possible as this list is read only.

        Parameters:
        bid - Bid to remove.
        Returns:
        Instance of the item for setters chaining.
